sentence.Network_en: Don't be faint-hearted when things seem a bit slow or boring.

sentence.Network_cn: 她对每个人每件事都很热心、宽厚。

entry.tran: （与 kind、cold 等形容词连用构成形容词）表示“心地…的”，“心肠…的”，“心情…的”
entry.def: -hearted combines with adjectives such as 'kind' or 'cold' to form adjectives which indicate that someone has a particular character or personality or is in a particular mood.

example.ex: They are now realising just how much they owe to kind-hearted strangers...
example.tran: 他们现在开始意识到那些心地善良的陌生人帮了他们多大的忙。

example.ex: That Harriet is a cold-hearted bitch...
example.tran: 那个哈丽雅特是个心肠冷酷的婊子。

means.word_mean: 1. (used only in combination) having a heart as specified;

sentences.sentence: "gave pleasure to lighter-hearted members of the staff"
